$TNT "Additionally
column3: another primary objective was to demonstrate to banks and other financial institutions that they could safely and efficiently make loans and extend credit to small and medium size enterprises using our Business Hub.  In establishing ASFC
column4: we did not intend to enter the business of lending.  We simply used ASFC as a manner of attracting banking and financial institutions as clients that would thereafter use our technology services offered in the Business Hub.  As ASFC has now served its marketing purpose
column5: we intend to dispose of our interest in that company."
